name: Stairway to Heaven (aerica)
description:
A game about life’s expectations, un-expectations, and cute dogs.

Read my DevLog about this game here!

(Fun fact: this is my "first" ever Unity game! Hope it makes you smile.)

CONTROLS:
Move: WASD / Arrow keys
Look: Cursor
Run: Shift
Jump: Spacebar

Quit: Esc (OR) Command+Q
